solution_line_template: There are {total_layers} - {limestone_layers} = <<{total_layers}-{limestone_layers}={non_limestone_layers}>>{non_limestone_layers} layers of rock that are not limestone.

Half of those {non_limestone_layers} are sandstone, so there are {non_limestone_layers} / {half_divisor} = <<{non_limestone_layers}/{half_divisor}={non_limestone_sandstone_layers}>>{non_limestone_sandstone_layers} that are not limestone or sandstone.

Four of those are quartz, so {non_limestone_sandstone_layers} - {quartz_layers} = <<{non_limestone_sandstone_layers}-{quartz_layers}={non_limestone_sandstone_quartz_layers}>>{non_limestone_sandstone_quartz_layers} layers are not limestone, sandstone, or quartz.

Half of the rest are shale, so {non_limestone_sandstone_quartz_layers} / {shale_half_divisor} = <<{non_limestone_sandstone_quartz_layers}/{shale_half_divisor}={single_layer_rocks}>>{single_layer_rocks} kinds of rock remain that make up only one layer in the strata.
